column1: Little Goat Diner////I don't really get all the rave reviews. If you're looking for good diner food at an affordable price
column3: our server let us look at our menus for maybe 5-7 minutes and then came to our table and said something to the tune of
column5: time to go." Didn't ask us if we were ready and seemed to want to rush us
column6: which isn't what you want to feel in a diner.
